attributes.action: Regulate the practice of Islamic Halal slaughter to prevent animal cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regulate the practice of Islamic Halal slaughter to prevent animal cruelty; such a policy might also cover other religious practices involving the slaughter of animals for meat. Labelling should also be clearly displayed on ritually slaughtered meat if put forward for public sale in the UK including restaurants and other public food vendors.

government_responses.details:
